text: Ventriloquism is a form of stage theater in which a person changes his or her voice so that it sounds like the voice is coming from somewhere else (usually a puppet or a dummy). A ventriloquist is one who performs this art. == Origins == Originally, it was practiced in religion.Howard, Ryan (2013). Punch and Judy in 19th Century America: A History and Biographical Dictionary. McFarland. p. 101. Now, it is used in comedy. == History of modern-day ventriloquism == Today's modern ventriloquism started in nightclubs.Encyclop√¶dia Britannica Eleventh Edition, 1911, Ventriloquism. == Notable ventriloquists == *Jeff Dunham == References == Category:Performing arts Category:Puppets
title: Ventriloquism
